sentences.sContent: Many of the girls seemed to be infused with excitement on seeing the snow.
sentences.sCn: 许多女孩子似乎一看到雪心里就充满了兴奋。

remMethod.val: in (进入) + fuse (倾注) → 注入

trans.tranCn: 输入， 注入； 浸泡
trans.tranOther: if you infuse tea or herbs or if they infuse, you leave them in very hot water while their taste passes into the water
